entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Churchill Airport 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 79 %

Dewpoint: -21.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
